creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstract image; blues, greys, tan, brown with purple splatters predominately at right and yellow splatters predominately at left; received in strip frame with gold at front edge
inscription: Titled in black marker(?), verso ULC: \"Some day Before April\"
markings: Paper gallery label affixed verso on stretcher cross support: Andre Emmerich, New York
signed: Signed and dated in black marker(?), verso ULC: Peter Bradley / 1973
title: Some Day Before April
